document.title: SP503-B-Mosquito Control Around Homes

author.organization: The University of Tennessee Agricultural Extension Service

document.abstract: There are strategies you can use to reduce the mosquito population around your home! This fact sheet will describe the different types of mosquitoes found in Tennessee as well as strategies residents can use to prevent the buildup of the most common species found around homes, mainly those species that have larvae in containers such as tires, etc.
document.publication-title: Insects, Pests, Plant Diseases and Weeds
